channel.title: Seeking skilled developers looking for a serious business venture
channel.description:
My partner and I are looking for SERIOUS skilled developers to embark upon a new journey with. As many of you know, the technological world is expanding vastly every single day of our lives. To put it into perspective take a look at when our parents grew up. Before all of the corporations and technologies we have today that have simplified our lives and made things easier. Most of them sat around and watched these companies became what they are today. Most work for these companies they watched grow today. You create someone else's dream or create your own.
I'm looking to take the mobile app world by storm with the ideas we've put on the drawing board. If you're looking for a serious opportunity that will become whatever we make it...
Contact me at: ideotman@hotmail.com(via email or message me for Facebook/Personal contact information For further information and a chat. I am located in CA USA.
Looking for: Senior Java Developers

item.title: Seeking skilled developers looking for a serious business venture
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Why are you asking for mobile app developers in the web design board? Why aren’t you stating more about the company? Why aren’t you stating the rate of pay? If you’re a competent person why would you post in the wrong board like a derp?

Read full topic
item.source: Seeking skilled developers looking for a serious business venture

item.title: Seeking skilled developers looking for a serious business venture
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

would this be considered SERIOUS business?

Yes it is quite serious, we’ve already found some sponsors for our new project.
We have all the tools and resources we need to become successful.
We just need people looking to join the empire we plan to build.

[quote=“Ambokile, post:8, topic:540694”][quote author=Jonnydpickle link=topic=659558.msg4410589#msg4410589 date=1393491143]

looking for SERIOUS skilled developers

Contact me at: ideotman@hotmail.com

Have had these accounts since I was younger, business contacts are disclosed. haha
Thanks for pointing that out though, was waiting for it.
[/quote]

No problem, you may want to get a more professional email to post on sites, though.[/quote]
I feel you, I haven’t been on Mopar in forever, and I know some seriously skilled devs come through here.
I figured I’d try it, I’m just looking for people ready to change their lives.

Read full topic
item.source: Seeking skilled developers looking for a serious business venture

item.title: Seeking skilled developers looking for a serious business venture
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

My team is actually looking for business links in the Bay area and you guys sound like you have a very similar vision. We too believe that these new tech industries are going to influence a new wave of mobile computing. Would you like to meet for coffee to discuss ideas? I highly recommend Philz Coffee as they do custom blends from all over the world. Hit me up: 760-987-5748

Read full topic

My partner and I are looking for SERIOUS skilled developers to embark upon a new journey with.
As many of you know, the technological world is expanding vastly every single day of our lives.
To put it into perspective take a look at when our parents grew up.
Before all of the corporations and technologies we have today that
have simplified our lives and made things easier.
